settings.title: "Blown away by the hair quality..."
settings.paragraph: Tracy here from Guilford CT level 3 NBR certified and only been using Hair Compounds for a couple months now but completely blown away by the hair quality and the customer service! Thank you for saving us from the silicone hair and having CONSISTENCY in your quality, it's the only way our clients will continue to be happy with their hair and trust us so.... HALLELUJAH!! ❤️❤️❤️ P.S. been wearing your custom curly in my hair since Tuesday and holy shit!!! The thickest, most beautiful hair I've ever had and I've been wearing extensions for over 10 years. And the texture is a perfect match. Ssssooooo happy.

settings.title: "I'm obsessed..."
settings.paragraph: I’m in Phoenix, AZ, level 3 NBR stylist and have been using H&C since March! I’m obsessed and love the quality and commitment that HC stands for. I also love that it’s ethically sourced and that they’re standards are high. Thank you for having amazing hair that our clients and ourselves can use. I love HC’s customer service, honestly they go above and beyond for us and it’s amazing.

settings.title: "My installs are way cleaner looking and faster"
settings.paragraph: I’m in absolute LOVE with hair compounds hair, I’ve been using it since April 2018 and I’ve never been happier with the quality of the hair. I love that the texture is very natural, fluffy, and wavy. I do not have to fight against shiny silicone. I notice my installs are way cleaner looking and faster. The hair holds color really well.

settings.title: What Some of Our Customers Are Saying
Instant Customer Service
settings.paragraph: Speak To One Of Our Team Members

settings.title: Tried & Tested
settings.paragraph: All our hand-made hair extensions go through a rigorous review for quality, performance, and longevity.

settings.title: Straight from the Source
settings.paragraph: We source, produce, and supply 100% real Remy human hair extensions to licensed hair professionals.

settings.title: Stylist-Driven
settings.paragraph: By consistently placing our stylists' feedback at the intersection of our production and supply process for nearly 25 years, we’re able to create a one-of-a-kind product.

settings.title: Real Remy Human Hair
settings.paragraph: Our hair extensions are real human hair with the cuticles intact and root aligned. All the hair is smooth yet durable, has consistency from root to tip.
